hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I'm originally from Dublin but now live in Edinburgh pharmacie cap 3000 horaires dimanche The rub is that we often take convenience too far. “Look at the technology of agriculture taken to an extreme — where we have industrialized farms that are not good for the environment or animals or nourishment,” he says. “Look at a country full of people who have had such convenient access to calories that theyâre addicted, obese, and sick.” He likens this agricultural nightmare to our unhealthy obsession with internet numbers like retweets and likes and followers and friends.
